description:
This course was inspired by my many years of trying to make sense of the working world and answer the following questions:

  • How do I stand out just by sending a resume?
  • What is the secret to landing "prestigious" jobs?
  • How do I effectively tell my story in only one page?

This resume is a culmination of 10 years of trying and failing myself, but also helping others land jobs at The White House, McKinsey & Company and Deutsche Bank and get accepted to MIT Sloan and other leading schools.

You should take this class if you are serious about your career and want to re-think everything you ever know about the working world.
title: Nailing your Story and Writing the Perfect Resume
